response.message: Will this happen again next year?
Part of the fun of hats was seeing them ill fitting! Some people put their faces as their avatar, and ill fitting hats give some truly hilarious images. I love the hats, SE.

@Sean: Aren't you getting ahead of yourself? Winter Bash just started for this year! @rod: I'm sure there will still be poorly fitted hats. If not, I hope that cleverly-placed hats will provide equal or greater humor value.
Curious How to get more hats?
What is this ? I thought stackoverflow is very Strict, and don't like to Enjoy life!!
Nice Hats enjoying the Fun to get as many as possible
I want to wear more than one hat at the same time. Please let us wear more than 1 hat at the same time.
It might be winter in your part of the world but here in the southern hemisphere it's glorious summer!! :-)
Wot? No "tag wiki" hats? I want to complain! No - I *am* complaining!! >.< Bah, foo bug!
The resize & twist feature is amazing! Good job @balpha
Will be great if keyboard arrows can control "resize and twist" feature. Great work!
+ 1 to @Optimizer  "I want to wear more than one hat at the same time"
Couldn't this involve drinking and appetizers?

Why do you think it is winter for everyone?
It's hard to celebrate the winter in the summer, with temperatures above 30°C.
Whoa! that's nice to hear that stackoverflow also likes fun some times... ;)
Yeah! Hats are back! Hat's off to SE! Or hats on I suppose!
Hats are awesome in SO!!! i like it.

Can we have some Meat Hats? 

Cos for some of us it's time to crank up the barbie mate.

Sausage works well and is easy to tuck behind the ears.

Next year - custom site hats.

Skeptics needs a tin-foil hat
Hah I got Werewolf Hunter hat .. It looks Great :)
Good work.
This is the first time I am on blog of stackoverflow
I like the idea, feels funny ;)
Aww.. my lovely hats are back ..give me those old hard earned hats back :( :(
Nice Chesterton quote! There should be a Chesterton hat (or at the very least a pince-nez) for obsessively quoting him on Christianity StackExchange.

Sounds like we need more of this during the long cold winters here in the northern hemisphere :D

Keep up the good work guys!
So the hats are visible to the fellow SO'ers? Because, I don't see the hat on my profile if I viewed the profile without logging in.

@mystarrocks: Take a look at the FAQ: "Users on Stack Overflow have to choose to opt-in individually. Just click the "Winter Bash" popup at the top and click "I love hats!", and you'll be able to earn hats and see other hat-loving users sporting dashing works of millinery."
I really love this idea . If you are here in Boston then  we do not need to welcome winter as it is already here
I like your blog. if you want to more information visit http://www.trendingonindia.com
